function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating UAVs in the COVID-19 impact response system","Impact":"Limited ability to effectively and safely utilize drone technology for delivering medical supplies and essential goods","Mitigation":"Collaboration between government agencies, industry stakeholders, and international organizations to establish clear regulatory frameworks","Technologies":"Policy and regulatory management software for tracking and enforcing drone regulations","People":"Government agencies, industry stakeholders, international organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations, international organizations"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of drones for delivery","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission if proper sanitation and hygiene measures are not implemented for the drones and delivery packages","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict sanitation protocols for drone maintenance and package handling, including regular disinfection and use of protective coverings","Technologies":"Drone sanitization and disinfection systems, contactless package handling technology","People":"Drone operators, logistics personnel, general public","Owner":"Drone operators, logistics companies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on drone technology may lead to a reduction in human-to-human interactions, impacting social interactions and community cohesion","Impact":"Decreased social connections and community engagement, potential mental health impacts","Mitigation":"Promotion of alternative social engagement strategies, community outreach initiatives, and public awareness campaigns to address the social impact of reduced human interaction","Technologies":"Virtual community platforms, mental health support apps, social engagement monitoring tools","People":"General public, community organizations, mental health professionals","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals, local government"}]}
